title: Mz 123 Schwert f
credit_line: Gift of Aluminum Company of America
provenance_text:
By inheritance, the artist's son Ernst Schwitters, Lysaker, Norway, 1948; Charlotte Weidler, New York [1].  G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA, until June 26, 1965; G. David Thompson estate, June 1965-November 1966;  G. David Thompson sale, Parke-Bernet, New York, NY, March 23-24, 1966, no 29 (not sold) [2]; The Aluminum Company of America, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1966 to October 19, 1967 [3]; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1967.

Notes:
[1]. Early provenance from "Kurt Schwitters; Catalogue Raisonn√©, Volume 1, 1905-1922", edited by Karin Orchard and Isabel Schulz, Hatje Cantz, 2000 and from [2] below.
[2]. "The G. David Thompson Collection of Twentieth Century Paintings and Sculptures" ; this lot, titled "Wol", was included in the first day of the auction, March 23, 1966.
[3]. Part of the Alcoa Collection of Contemporary Art.
